Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Salivaricin P (chain a: Sln1; Gly-rich; natural AMPs; two-chain class 2b bacteriocins; Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes. For chain b: Sln2, see Info; UCLL2a)

Literature Information.Literature: A two chain bacteriocin. Since the sequene for chain a is identical to the chain a of ABP-118, we show sequence b here, which is also similar to chain b of ABP-118 with only two changes: T43 to Ala and Arg46 to His (See AP01172).
Literature Information.Author: Barrett E, Hayes M, O'Connor P, Gardiner G, Fitzgerald GF, Stanton C, Ross RP, Hill C.2007
Literature Information.Title: Salivaricin P, one of a family of two-component antilisterial bacteriocins produced by intestinal isolates of Lactobacillus salivarius.
